thread.title: Ground News - Department of Human Rights finds 25,000 errors in disability cases
thread.title_full: Ground News - Department of Human Rights finds 25,000 errors in disability cases

author: berlingske.dk
title: Ground News - Department of Human Rights finds 25,000 errors in disability cases
text:
Summary by berlingske.dk The Department of Human Rights, in a new memo, has reviewed complaints to the Appeals Board in the area of adult disability and found over 25,000 errors. This was reported by Politiken on Thursday. The errors have been found in cases dating from 2014 to 2022. These can be, for example, cases of assistance in rehabilitation, accompaniment or assistive devices. The 25,089 errors found by the Institute for Human Rights fall into two groups. In 6605… Share menu More
